name: cross-chain-defi-dashboard
description: A decentralized application that aggregates financial data from multiple blockchains, leveraging Reactive Smart Contracts to autonomously react to market events and provide real-time analytics, portfolio management, and cross-chain investment opportunities.

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend

author: Abdullah Al Ameer
